methods.name: glm::fastAcos
methods.short: Faster than the common acos function but less accurate. Defined between -2pi and 2pi. From GLM_GTX_fast_trigonometry extension.

methods.name: glm::fastAsin
methods.short: Faster than the common asin function but less accurate. Defined between -2pi and 2pi. From GLM_GTX_fast_trigonometry extension.

methods.name: glm::fastAtan
methods.short: Faster than the common atan function but less accurate. Defined between -2pi and 2pi. From GLM_GTX_fast_trigonometry extension.

methods.name: glm::fastAtan
methods.parameters: T y, T x
methods.short: Faster than the common atan function but less accurate. Defined between -2pi and 2pi. From GLM_GTX_fast_trigonometry extension.

methods.name: glm::fastCos
methods.short: Faster than the common cos function but less accurate. From GLM_GTX_fast_trigonometry extension.

methods.name: glm::fastSin
methods.short: Faster than the common sin function but less accurate. From GLM_GTX_fast_trigonometry extension.

methods.name: glm::fastTan
methods.short: Faster than the common tan function but less accurate. Defined between -2pi and 2pi. From GLM_GTX_fast_trigonometry extension.

methods.name: glm::wrapAngle
methods.short: Wrap an angle to [0 2pi[ From GLM_GTX_fast_trigonometry extension.
